plot: A deep dive into America's booming sports betting industry, exploring its rapid growth, potential risks, and possible solutions, plus a peculiar side story about Mahmoud Khalil's arrest.

John Oliver talks about the United States of America's massive industry of Sports Betting. He points how sports gambling became so big, why it could be so damaging and what fixes might be possible to make things a bit better. Additionally he discusses the bizarre arrest of Mahmoud Khalil.—Niaz Islam Arif
